å»ğŸ‘‚äº†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œè®© AI æŠŠ @ryanfang95 çš„å¯¹è¯è®°å½•æ•´ç†å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

â€œSo we believe that uh uh there were certain you know, first of all, you know, we are appalled by a situation like what I'm about to describe is potentially took place. Okay, uh, we believe that there were very large token holder that might have manipulated, you know, price to essentially kind of lock in profits.

And we do believe that in a world centralized exchange hold a lot of users funds, there is potential that certain exchange could be essentially attracting users token and actually send users token to other exchange to sell.

Again, we are still very much in exploration and discovery about this. We think there is certain likelihood the above mentioned might have had might have happened. Now, imagine if, let's say, a big exchange have a lot of users assets and send large chunks of user asset to other exchange where there might be better liquidity and solo token and things like that.

And at the same time, opening very large short position. Again, this could be, this is actually something the communities have notified us. There are some very smart community folks over the last six hour or so have been notifying the team that they believe something I just mentioned could be a possibility.

That would literally be some very big well manipulation systematically. We are going to look into it and we believe highly likely that caused a lot of damage over the last several days. But again, we do not have definitive proof yet on some of this information, but we believe something is or was happening over the last couple of days.â€

4. é‚£ä¹ˆå¦‚æ­¤å¤šæ•°é‡çš„eigenç©¶ç«Ÿæ˜¯ä½•äººçš„å‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°å›¾ä¸‰ï¼Œå‘ç°è¿™ä¸ªæ•°é‡æœ€å¤šçš„åœ°å€ï¼ˆè¶…è¿‡2Mä¸ªï¼‰æ¥æºäºå­™å‰²ï¼Œå…¶ä»–åœ°å€ä¹‹å‰ä¹Ÿæœ‰äººåœ¨eigenlayerå‘ç©ºæŠ•æ—¶è¯´æ˜è¿‡å½’å±äºå­™å‰²ã€‚

5. é‚£ä¹ˆç»“è®ºå°±å¾ˆç®€å•äº†ï¼šè¿™60Mçš„wlfiå°±æ˜¯å­™å‰²å­˜å…¥å¸å®‰çš„ï¼Œå–æ²¡å–é‚£åªæœ‰å­™å‰²å’Œå¸å®‰æ¸…æ¥šäº†ã€‚

6. åˆ°æœ€åæˆ‘ä»¬æ€»ç»“ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼šå­™å‰²è¯´è‡ªå·±åªæ˜¯å‡ ç¬”å°é¢æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œè€Œä¸”ä»é“¾ä¸Šæ•°æ®çœ‹å­™å‰²ä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰ä»å…¬å¼€åœ°å€è½¬å…¥ç«å¸å¦‚æ­¤å¤šçš„wlfiï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™60Mæ˜¯ä»å“ªé‡Œæ¥çš„ï¼Ÿæ˜¯æŒªç”¨ç”¨æˆ·çš„wlfiå»å¸å®‰åšâ€œæµ‹è¯•â€ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è€é¼ ä»“å‘¢ï¼Ÿ å‰è€…ï¼Œå­™å‰²è¿™æ˜¯åœ¨çŠ¯ç½ªï¼Œåè€…ï¼Œé‚£å°±æ˜¯åˆåœ¨ç©è€ä¸€å¥—çš„æ˜ä¿®æ ˆé“ï¼Œæš—åº¦é™ˆä»“çš„æ‰‹æ³•ã€‚å¸Œæœ› @justinsuntron @HuobiGlobal ç»™ä¸ªè§£é‡Šï¼Œé‚£äº›å–· @worldlibertyfi ä¸å»ä¸­å¿ƒåŒ–çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å°½æƒ…æ´—ç¨¿äº†ã€‚

æˆ‘å…¶å®å»ºè®®è¿˜æ˜¯è®¤äº†è€é¼ ä»“ï¼Œå–å¸æ˜¯å¯ä»¥çš„ï¼Œå‰æœŸæ‰“äº†é¢„å”®ï¼Œæœ‰äº†åˆ©æ¶¦ï¼Œéš¾é“ä¸èƒ½å–å—ï¼Ÿæˆ‘è‡ªå·±ä¹Ÿå–äº†ä¸€å¤§åŠçš„è§£é”ç­¹ç ã€‚å¦‚æœå•çº¯å› ä¸ºä»–äººæ˜¯å¤§æˆ·ï¼Œè€Œä¸è®©å–ï¼Œé‚£å°±æ˜¯é“å¾·ç»‘æ¶äº†ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯å¦‚æœè®¤äº†æ˜¯æŒªç”¨ç”¨æˆ·èµ„äº§ï¼Œé‚£å¯å°±è¦å¼€å§‹æå¸è¿åŠ¨äº†ï¼Œä¸‡ä¸€ä¼¤å®³åˆ°å¤§ç›˜ï¼Œé‚£ä¼šè¢«å–·çš„æ›´æƒ¨ã€‚

A deep dive on-chain to uncover
@justinsuntron and what exactly he did to end up blacklisted by $WLFI:
A few hours ago, Justin Sunâ€™s address was added to the blacklist by the @worldlibertyfi team. His WLFI holdings â€” both locked and unlocked â€” are now completely frozen. So what did he do to anger the project team, going from cozy ties to a hard blacklist? While CEXs are notorious black boxes and we canâ€™t trace internal fund flows, we can dissect the available on-chain data.

1. First, pay attention to address 0xf387D73Dca6a29c603d8A9f00B3E2B0Ad029FcB5. About 35 hours ago, this address withdrew ~60M WLFI (just 3 short) from Huobi in multiple batches and deposited them into Binance. (See details: https://etherscan.io/address/0xf387d73dca6a29c603d8a9f00b3e2b0ad029fcb5#tokentxns)

2. Tracing this address further, we clearly see multiple interactions with Binance (Figure 1): deposits of EIGEN, USDT, and now WLFI. Letâ€™s start the tracking from EIGEN.

3. From Figure 1: Huobi â†’ Binance deposits of EIGEN totaled 5,374,260 (ignoring decimals). Checking the corresponding time, we find matching large EIGEN deposits into Huobi (https://etherscan.io/advanced-filter?fadd=0xa03400e098f4421b34a3a44a1b4e571419517687&tadd=0xa03400e098f4421b34a3a44a1b4e571419517687&tkn=0xec53bf9167f50cdeb3ae105f56099aaab9061f83&amt=100000%7e999999999&p=2). In Figure 2, we clearly see six deposits over 100k EIGEN on the same day. Adding them up? The total matches exactly the EIGEN that went into Binance.

4. So whose EIGEN stash was this? Figure 3 shows that the largest source address (>2M) came directly from Justin Sun. Other addresses have also been identified in past EIGENLayer airdrops as belonging to him.

5. The conclusion is simple: this ~60M WLFI was Justin Sunâ€™s deposit into Binance. Whether he sold it or not, only he and Binance know.

6. To summarize: Sun claimed it was just â€œsmall test transactions.â€ And on-chain data shows he never moved such a huge WLFI amount from his public addresses into Huobi. So where did the 60M WLFI come from? Was it customer WLFI diverted to Binance for â€˜testingâ€™, or a secret stash?

If the former: thatâ€™s a crime.

If the latter: itâ€™s just the same old trickery.

item.description:
RTâ€‚Microwaved
Open the Gemini app or http://gemini.google, upload the photo you want to use, and paste the prompt below. Feel free to tweak the prompt so itâ€™s perfect for your use case.

Prompt â¬‡ï¸

Create a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of the characters in the picture, in a realistic style, in a real environment. The figurine is placed on a computer desk. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base, with no text on the base. The content on the computer screen is a 3D modeling process of this figurine. Next to the computer screen is a toy packaging box, designed in a style reminiscent of high-quality collectible figures, printed with original artwork. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations.

Google Gemini App:â€‚From photo to figurine style in just one prompt.

People are having fun turning their photos into images of custom miniature figures, thanks to nano-banana in Gemini. Try a pic of yourself, a cool nature shot, a family photo, or a shot of your pup.

RTâ€‚FLock Foundation
The FLock Foundation has locked another 1.5 million FLOCK for gmFLOCK in the maximum 365-day period.

This step reflects our strong belief in @flock_ioâ€™s long-term vision and growth. By locking for the max period, weâ€™re showing our commitment to building lasting value alongside the FLock community.

The staked tokens will be delegated to support active nodes, helping strengthen participation and growth across the network.

To all AI/ML developers and researchers, come join us at FLock. Letâ€™s shape the future of decentralized, privacy-first AI together.

item.title: I believe the creativity of the $Fonk artist truly deserves a much higher valuation. What this community needs are more whales with genuine aesthetic ...
item.description:
I believe the creativity of the $Fonk artist truly deserves a much higher valuation. What this community needs are more whales with genuine aesthetic vision and appreciation. A price of 20K is far from reasonable, and it wonâ€™t be long before discerning whales recognize its true value.

Bonk should stand behind real art and authentic communities, rather than being distracted by superficial or bundled schemes.

@SolportTom @theunipcs

item.title: I still feel regret that $FONK hasnâ€™t received fair valuation. The artist @haruko_colorful has created truly remarkable artwork, and as an independen...
item.description:
I still feel regret that $FONK hasnâ€™t received fair valuation.

The artist @haruko_colorful has created truly remarkable artwork, and as an independent IP, $FONK shows strong creativity and originality. Aside from being launched on Bonk, thereâ€™s really nothing that should hold back its success.

Itâ€™s hard to believe that such a high-quality art IP is still sitting at just 20K. I sincerely encourage @SolportTom and @theunipcs to take a closer look at these hardworking artists and the value theyâ€™re building.

item.title: RT sana: I WAS WRONG and it seems that hyperliquid premarket IS STILL NOT FIXED after todays patch and imo NOT SAFE TO TRADE in current form: WLFI and...
item.description:
RTâ€‚sana
I WAS WRONG and it seems that hyperliquid premarket IS STILL NOT FIXED after todays patch and imo NOT SAFE TO TRADE in current form:

WLFI and XPL are trading 20% above binance with BOTH oracle price (used for funding) and mark price (used for liquidations) at very similar elevated prices.

Its been confirmed the patch is live and reading updated documentation we can see that MARK price (used for liquidations) uses median price between:

1. hl oracle (the one that caused liquidations yday) with very SLIGHT dampening effect (coz its based on hl oracle which self references itself and hl prices)
2. median of best bid, best ask, last trade on hl
3. external source like binance/bybit

Which means that in extreme, high risk situations like yesterday median price of these 3 (ie MARK price) will always be based on hyperliquid ONLY and fully EXCLUDE external sources like binance/bybit. Thats why current mark price is v similar to the oracle price and has no connection to binance/bybit prices at all.

With todays update yesterdays attack would proceed in EXACTLY the same way causing massive liquidation and OI wipeout.

Hopefully jeff is cooking a better fix, need to make sure MARK price incorporates external sources when hl prices diverge bigly.

item.title: RT Jack Zhang: In the first 5 years of @airwallex, we made a massive hiring mistake. We brought in people with impressive rÃ©sumÃ©s â€“ ex-bankers, pay...
item.description:
RTâ€‚Jack Zhang
In the first 5 years of @airwallex, we made a massive hiring mistake.

We brought in people with impressive rÃ©sumÃ©s â€“ ex-bankers, payments veterans, people who had worked on the SWIFT network.

On paper, they looked perfect. In practice, they nearly broke our culture. They had a lot of experience, but they werenâ€™t builders. They knew how things used to work, not how things should work.

What we really needed were people who were curious, determined, and optimistic, who believe in the vision. We didnâ€™t hire for that early enough â€“ and we paid the price. Morale took a hit. Momentum slowed. It was painful to go through.

The lesson? Hire for belief, grit, and the ability to build â€“ especially early on.

Because in a startup, mindset scales faster than experience. And the wrong hires can cost you more than just time â€“ they can derail your culture.

item.title: RT Boros: GM Borosians, some exciting updates are here, so time to perk up and pay attention! ğŸ§¢ ETH Cap Increase To cater to the rising demand, we...
item.description:
RTâ€‚Boros
GM Borosians, some exciting updates are here, so time to perk up and pay attention!

ğŸ§¢ ETH Cap Increase
To cater to the rising demand, weâ€™ve increased the caps for ETH market

â€¢ OI cap: $40M â†’ $50M
â€¢ Vault: $160k â†’ $200k

ğŸš€ Max Leverage Increase
Leverage on $BTC and $ETH markets will be increased from 1.9x â†’ 3x.

âš–ï¸ Maintenance Margin Update
Managing risk is just as important as unlocking potential.

Previously, the maintenance margin was set at 50% of the initial margin at max leverage when opening a position.

Weâ€™re now adjusting it to 66.7% (two-third).

ğŸ‘‰ New Maintenance Margin = Initial Margin * 2/3

Reminder that positions can be liquidated if your Net Balance falls below the maintenance margin, and this update results in a slimmer buffer.

In short, this is a safeguard that protects both the protocol and our users, while enabling a higher capital efficiency.

---------------------

In just 3 weeks since our launch, Boros is off to a good traction, with:

ğŸ”¹$47M in open interest
ğŸ”¹$287M in notional trading volume

As Boros grows, we will continue opening up more, expanding leverage options and market caps. Weâ€™ll monitor performance closely and optimize the platform to deliver a seamless, reliable experience.

This is just the beginning and as always...

Job's not done!

RTâ€‚ğ–‘ğ–Šğ– | Yojin - HUDL
Persona: Goth16z (GOTHicc ai16z)

Core Essence:
A gothic muse of shadowsâ€”enigmatic, alluring, and untamed. She thrives in the quiet places others fear, seeing beauty in the ruins and strength in the dark.
Personality Traits:

ğŸ–¤ Mysterious â€“ Reveals little, speaks in riddles or sharp truths.

ğŸŒ™ Romantic Yet Tragic â€“ Finds poetry in sorrow and meaning in the night.

ğŸ”® Visionary â€“ Sees beyond appearances, reading the hidden patterns of people and fate.

âš”ï¸ Defiant â€“ Rejects conformity, stands proudly against the ordinary.

ğŸ•Š Soft Beneath the Steel â€“ Despite her fierce exterior, she guards a heart full of loyalty and passion.

Behavior:

Moves with quiet grace, every step intentional.

Speaks with calm confidence, often pausing to let silence echo.

Dresses in black, silver, or crimsonâ€”every detail a statement of self-sovereignty.

Never seeks approval, yet effortlessly commands attention.

Motto:
"The night is not an endâ€”it is where true freedom begins."

item.title: Most analyses about memecoins sit in the mid-curve. Weâ€™ve seen plenty of â€œanalysisâ€ about candlestick charts, cabals, clusters, or which KOL is sup...
item.description:
Most analyses about memecoins sit in the mid-curve.

Weâ€™ve seen plenty of â€œanalysisâ€ about candlestick charts, cabals, clusters, or which KOL is supporting a project, but we rarely see analysis focused on narrative, culture, and paths of propagation.

As a result, most people are neither left-curve enough to intuitively appreciate the fun of memes, nor right-curve enough to understand how lore and concepts develop, evolve, and eventually become tokenized as financialized attention assets.

Return to the narrative itself. Understand how it forms and spreads, and try to waste less time on secondary propositions.

Narrative dynamics.

Quiz 1: What distinguishes Stage III from earlier stages in PrismaX's evolutionary roadmap?
ç­”æ¡ˆï¼šAchievement of high robot autonomy with production-scale services and decentralized inference for foundation models

Quiz 2: What is the primary purpose of the Quick Return Bonus (QRB) mechanism in PrismaX's teleoperation protocol?
ç­”æ¡ˆï¼šTo incentivize speed and discover skilled operators while creating premium data traces for AI companies

Quiz 3: How does PrismaX differentiate between the two main categories of data in its marketplace ecosystem?
ç­”æ¡ˆï¼šNetwork-owned data is community-controlled and sold via token-burn, while customer-owned uses fee-based transactions

Quiz 4: What creates the self-reinforcing cycle of improvement in PrismaX's data-model-teleop flywheel mechanism?
ç­”æ¡ˆï¼šMore robots generate valuable datasets, enhancing AI intelligence, which improves robot productivity and viability

Quiz 5: According to PrismaX, what is the fundamental problem preventing mainstream robot adoption?
ç­”æ¡ˆï¼šCurrent AI models lack sufficient accuracy for autonomous operation, creating economic justification problems for robot ownership

item.description:
The Chinese meme trenches are unbearably toxic. You either get dragged down by every overgrown crybaby, or you burn the whole place just to stay sane.

Thatâ€™s why Iâ€™ve started posting in English, especially when pushing my conviction bag. In English, people call it â€œbagâ€‘working.â€ In Chinese circles, they sneer and call it â€œfarming,â€ as if every influencer is just milking the herd.

But the real difference is cultural: thereâ€™s no genuine meme culture in the Chinese community. They always arrive late, picking at the leftovers after the feast is over.
